Text:
Resolution is 600x404 and not 720x404 (as mentioned in the info above)

are you sure or just kidding:

Width : 600 pixels
Height : 404 pixels
Display aspect ratio : 16:9

this makes display resolution of exactly 720x404

Width : 600 pixels
Height : 404 pixels
Display aspect ratio : 16:9

600x404 is Storage Aspect Ratio but Display Aspect Ratio is 16:9 so actual display size is 720x404
